feed.title: MechPy
feed.subtitle: MechPy: Empowering Engineers with a Comprehensive Toolbox for Continuum Mechanics and Finite Element Method (FEM) Analysis.

entry.title: Example - Material
entry.summary:
import sys import numpy as np import sympy as sp
sys.path.append("../src")
from core.numeric.material import IsotropicMaterial, TransverseIsotropicMaterial from core.symbolic.material import SymbolicIsotropicMaterial, SymbolicTransverseIsotropicMaterial,SymbolicOrthotropicMaterial
np.set_printoptions(formatter={"float": "{:0.2e}".format})
isotropic_material = IsotropicMaterial(210e9, 0.3) ...

entry.title: Introducing MechPy!
entry.summary: Welcome to the world of MechPy, a state-of-the-art toolbox designed for experts and enthusiasts in the field of Continuum Mechanics and Finite Element Method (FEM) Analysis. MechPy offers a unique blend of features that cater to both educational and professional needs in these complex domains.
